entry.title: Installing Cuckoo Sandbox on macOS
entry.content:
We will cover only installing Cuckoos and not the configurating process since this is really the most difficult hurdle we have seen for new analyst. Please use Cuckoos Project for configuration recommendations.

On a new macOS system there are a couple things we need to gather before installing

Pre-install collection

  • pip
  • virtualenv

Install pip

$ sudo easy_install pip

Install virtualenv & activate
entry.summary: We will cover only installing Cuckoos and not the configurating process since this is really the most difficult hurdle we have seen for new analyst. Please use Cuckoos Project for configuration recommendations.
